metadata.description: These microfilm reels contain the documents related to Alberta homestead claims filed between 1870 and 1930. Homestead files normally contain an application for homestead, an application for patent, and a notice that patent has been issued. They may also contain other documents such as inspectorâs reports, records of abandonment, handwritten letters, wills, naturalization certificates, scrip, seed grain liens, court, proceedings, etc. (from Alberta Genealogical Society Index to Alberta Homestead Records 1870 to 1930)
metadata.notes: Film/Fiche is presented as originally captured.
metadata.source: Rescan, not to be billed again. Archive out of order image bug.
metadata.subject: genealogy
